title-group.article-title: Lévi-Strauss and the Structuralist Reading of Marx

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1974 International Arts and Sciences Press, Inc.

p.mixed-citation: "Lévi-Strauss und die strukturalistische Marx-Lektüre," in Wolf Lepenies and Hans H. Ritter, eds., Orte des wilden Denkens, Frankfurt am Main, Suhrkamp Verlag, 1970, pp. 160-224.
